entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0115.9565] The concept ifrs-full:DividendsPaid with a period duration starting on 2023-05-09 and ending on 2023-05-10 or 1 days with a reported value of 279,622,000 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2022-12-31 and ends on 2023-12-31 with a value of 92,923,000. The value 279,622,000 for the period of 1 days should be less or the same as the value 92,923,000 with a duration of 365 days assuming that the concept ifrs-full:DividendsPaid cannot have a negative value. The properties of this ifrs-full:DividendsPaid fact are: Period :2023-05-10 to 2023-05-10 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9565 Rule version: 26.0.9 - cik0001004156-20241231.htm 48047

property.name: label
property.value: Dividends recognised as distributions to owners
